ATTENTION EVERYONE: THERE IS A GOOD REASON THIS IS NOT TAGGED AS NTR.

In case you aren't aware, this site doesn't actually post anything for themselves. Nor does anyone actually post here. This entire website is a SCRAPER website. It scrapes everything (manga and doujins only) from e-hentai / exhentai. That's where everything on this site comes from. In fact this site was originally meant to be a backup website for that one. 
The reason there is no tags is because this one copy pasted everything from there before the tagging was completely done. And it doesn't update after the fact. So even if the tagging is updated over there, the tagging it's not updated over here because it had already taken the screenshot.

So don't go be complaining over here at the tagging is wrong. You're literally complaining to a bot.
